EmailTemplate.name: SGP_BRD_16_Jameson evoucher campaign.Email - Confirmation (Cinema)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Gift from Jameson
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Trouble experiencing our offer? View in web browser. <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>
Congratulations!
This voucher entitles you to a FREE MOVIE TICKET at The Projector
Please click on the button below for the outlet attendant to validate your voucher. Enjoy!
This e-voucher is valid strictly for The Projector cinema, and is valid for one ticket only to regular screenings. In the case of a film being sold out, or a special screening, the voucher cannot be redeemed. Not to be exchanged. The offer may be redeemed up until 30th November 2016. After that, the e-coupon is no longer valid. Customers must be over the age of 18 to avail of this promotion.
Redemption is valid until 30th November 2016
